main_definition: Housewares refer to a range of household items used in domestic life, including cookware, tableware, kitchen utensils, and cleaning supplies.

meanings_and_examples.example: The housewares department at the store includes pots, pans, baking dishes, and cutting boards.
From plates to glasses, these items are part of your collection of housewares for meals at home or hosting guests.
Vacuum cleaners, dish soap, and other cleaning tools fall under the category of housewares.
